Package de.teamshrug.scooterms

Class ScooterHunter

java.lang.Object
de.teamshrug.scooterms.Customer
de.teamshrug.scooterms.ScooterHunter
public class ScooterHunter
extends Customer
Can do what a Customer can do, but is able to see Scooters with low battery and recharge them to top up the account balance

  • Method Details

    • returnMostEmptyScooterHotspot

      public ScooterHotspot returnMostEmptyScooterHotspot()
      Returns:
      Returns most-empty ScooterHotspot in the area where the ScooterHunter is

    • printScootersLowOnBattery

      public void printScootersLowOnBattery()
      Lets the ScooterHunter see which Scooters urgently need to be recharged

    • returnNearestScooterLowOnBattery

      public Scooter returnNearestScooterLowOnBattery()
      Returns:
      Returns nearest Scooter with a Battery percentage (or below) the "lowbattery" attribute.

    • calcBalanceForCharging

      public float calcBalanceForCharging​(int battery)
      Parameters:
      battery - Gets the percentage of battery of the scooter which is going to be charged
      Returns:
      Returns the earned credits for charging

    • chargeScooter

      public void chargeScooter​(Scooter scooter)
      Uses the return of calcBalanceForCharging to add the credits to the balance and fully recharges the scooter
      Parameters:
      scooter - Scooter from a list of scooters which are going to be charged by the ScooterHunter

    • bringBackScooterToHotspot

      public void bringBackScooterToHotspot​(Scooter scooter, ScooterHotspot scooterhotspot)
      Brings back a charged Scooter to a ScooterHotspot (the most empty one at best)
      Parameters:
      scooter - Scooter from a list of scooters which are charged by the ScooterHunter and will be brought back to a ScooterHotspot

    • getActiveInArea

      public Area getActiveInArea()

    • setActiveInArea

      public void setActiveInArea​(Area activeInArea)
